column5: I need someone to save me from 20 minutes of telephone on hold time:  Boat registration: When is it required and when isn't it?  Pelase keep in mind I am talking about smaller aluminum fishing boats and not those monster salmon boats on Lake Ontario.  thanks,  stuntman
10HP and up. This is why 9.9 outboards are so popular.
Stuntman,  Here is the link you will need.  http://www.tc.gc.ca/BoatingSafety/menu.htm  good luck John
Thanks for the link, tons of info.  stuntman
